name: Probopass
description: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing steel-type Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, Steel-type Pokémon have a higher encounter rate.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power.  This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.
